name: MessengerHub
description: Connect and interact with your Telegram, Discord, and Slack messages directly from OpenChat. Receive updates, search conversations, and ask questions about your messages from all platforms in one place.
features: Integrate Telegram, Discord, and Slack in a single interface
Receive real-time notifications from all your messaging platforms
Search and ask questions about your conversations in natural language
Track messages across multiple channels and platforms
Flexible connection management for each messaging service
